Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PtALF7 (Portunus trituberculatus anti-lipopolysaccharide factor isoform 7; crabs, Arthropods, ani
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Vibrio alginolyticus (MIC=0.51-1.02 µM), Edwardsiella tarda (MIC=2.04-4.07 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=1.02-2.04 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus (MIC=32.59-65.19 µM), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=8.15-16.30 µM).Fungi:Pichia pastoris (MIC>130.37 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: Contains a signal peptide and an LPS-binding Domain (CHVSRTPTVKRFKLYWKGKFWC) and two conserved cysteine residues which can form a disulfide bridge.

Literature.Title: Multiple isoforms of immune-related genes from hemocytes and eyestalk cDNA libraries of swimming crab Portunus trituberculatus.
Literature.Author: Liu Y, Cui Z, Song C, Wang S, Li Q.

Literature.Title: Molecular cloning, genomic structure and antimicrobial activity of PtALF7, a unique isoform of anti-lipopolysaccharide factor from the swimming crab Portunus trituberculatus.
Literature.Author: Liu Y, Cui Z, Li X, Song C, Shi G, Wang C.
